metadata.title: CVE-2013-6647 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
A use-after-free in AnimationController::endAnimationUpdate in GoogleChrome.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu0.14.04.1174
chromium-browser-l10n - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu0.14.04.1174
chromium-chromedriver - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu0.14.04.1174
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu0.14.04.1174
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu0.14.04.1174
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '58.0.3029.96-0ubuntu0.14.04.1174').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'Ubuntu touch end-of-life').
